post:
MyBB Hosting Services (MHS) is pleased to offer you some of our web hosting packages.

These are only some of our packages.
Full list of packages at [www.mybbse.net](http://www.mybbse.net)

**MINI Hosting**

1 GB disk space,
10 GB bandwidth, 
Host unlimited domains,
Cron Jobs,
cPanel Included

[Get the MINI plan for $2.25 / Month - Order Now](http://support.mybbse.net/order/main/packages/wht-shared-hosting-offers/?group_id=7)


**5PerYear**
5GB Bandwidth,
5GB Web Space,
cPanel,
Unlimited MySQL,
Unlimited Domains,
Only $5 Per Year

[Get the 5PerYear plan for $5.00 / Year - Order Now](http://support.mybbse.net/order/main/packages/wht-shared-hosting-offers/?group_id=7)


**Starter Plan**
200GB Monthly Data Transfer (Bandwidth),
8GB Web Space,
cPanel,
Only $5 per month or $50 per year!,
Pay Yearly and get 2 months FREE!

[Get the Starter Plan for $5.00 / Month - Order Now](http://support.mybbse.net/order/main/packages/shared-hosting/?group_id=2)


Q: What payment options are available?

A: Currently we support PayPal & Bitpay.

Q: How long does it take for my account to be setup?

A: All new signups are verified by our sales department to prevent abuse and fraud. On average you'll get your account details within 30 minutes.

Q: I have a sales question, how can I contact you?

A: We can be contacted through sales@mybbse.net

Q: Do you offer any other services?

A: Yes! We offer VPS and Dedicated Servers at a very reasonable price. View our plans on our website.

Q: What kind of support do you offer?

A: We offer support via our Client Portal.
